Articles.Content:
It's here!

My Six minutes and Twenty seconds long video that I teased yesterday is out!

Watch it below:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gGJzrw9fyNM

I wish i could make cinematics. I have a few scripts written out, but i can only make them mission reports

EDIT: also, +rep!

The Director's Cut is out.

It's basically the same as the original but touched up and edited.

3-4 seconds of screen time have been chopped off as well.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K8eHI4YFj6k

Most if not all these shots were from Nassaults videos. Nice editing and all, but there isn't even credits to Nassault for anything. Can you actually call this your own? Right now I can't really focus on the well fitted music or anything when what I'm watching is robbery. You have potential. Please add some credits.

*looks at youtube page. Sees credit to Nassault*

ok, nevermind. Just add some credits to the KSP page and you'll save yourself a lot of trouble. I was about to report this because filming is a pain in the butt (from my personal experience anyway) and having someone use your clips without credits is annoying for the creator.

Most if not all these shots were from Nassaults videos. Nice editing and all, but there isn't even credits to Nassault for anything. Can you actually call this your own? Right now I can't really focus on the well fitted music or anything when what I'm watching is robbery. You have potential. Please add some credits.

*looks at youtube page. Sees credit to Nassault*

ok, nevermind. Just add some credits to the KSP page and you'll save yourself a lot of trouble. I was about to report this because filming is a pain in the butt (from my personal experience anyway) and having someone use your clips without credits is annoying for the creator.

Yeah. I noticed too..

Until we know otherwise I'm going to assume ExplodingRocketShips has permission from Nassault to edit these clips in this way, so I'll thank everyone from refraining from jumping to any conclusions and grabbing any pitchforks/flaming torches, thank you

I think he would have given credit to Nassault if that was true...

I think he would have given credit to Nassault if that was true...
*looks at youtube page. Sees credit to Nassault*

Published on 14 Dec 2014

Cinematic by MyHeadIsASlushie

KSP FORUMS: ExplodingRocketShips

Credit to Nassault for film clips.

Look harder
ERS, how much of that video was yours ? Youtube page does credit Nassault.
